home.title: Next-Generation Quantum Solutions
home.description: MolKet offers management consulting and AI services for:
home.support_text: Supported by cloud-based hybrid HPC & quantum computing platforms, enabling the development of advanced machine learning algorithms with significant predictive power.

about.title: About MolKet
about.subtitle: Fast and accurate molecular design simulations assisted by AI
about.description_1: Chemistry simulations are time consuming and complicated to prepare. Our goal is to make the design process easier and fast. We use AI to train general Hamiltonians for chemistry simulations that can be executed efficiently on HPC, quantum computers, and on simulations of quantum computers.
about.description_2: The company also offers consulting services for training AI on datasets from fields such as chemistry, biology, materials science, and cosmology. These services are supported by physics-based kernels (e.g., quantum-mechanical kernels), enabling the development of advanced machine learning algorithms with significant predictive power.
about.process_title: Highly engineered, standard process for quantum chemistry simulations

services.title: Our Complementary Services
services.description: Alongside the cloud services, we can help you in the following areas

service_1.title: Designing algorithms for quantum molecular dynamics
service_1.description: Custom algorithm development optimized for your specific molecular simulation needs.

service_2.title: Adapt your application using HPC/QC
service_2.description: Integration services to enhance your existing applications with high-performance and quantum computing capabilities.

service_3.title: Training, consultancy, and knowledge transfer
service_3.description: Expert guidance and education to help your team master quantum computing technologies and applications.

step_1.title: Choose your AI-assisted Environment
step_1.description: You can choose a JupyterHub-like environment or MolKet studio. Use MolKet's engine on your computer in Visual Studio or program it online on the web.

step_2.title: Type your code or drag and design your simulation
step_2.description: Type your code in natural language, or choose from our library. Our AI-assistant will help you filling the code writing and suggest modules that you can use. Alternatively, you can design the simulation in a flow chart format.

step_3.title: MolKet's AI engine will assist in selecting the algorithms and computing platforms
step_3.description: Depending on the computational complexity and the type of each step in the simulation, MolKet's AI engine will choose the proper quantum/HPC architecture for you. It will also optimize the execution on each type of hardware by training the general Hamiltonians and map them onto quantum.

step_4.title: Get the results and post-processing using builtin ML and AI libraries
step_4.description: Depending on the computational complexity and the type of each step in the simulation, MolKet's AI engine will choose the proper quantum/HPC architecture for you.

featured_videos.title: Featured Videos
featured_videos.description: Discover how MolKet is revolutionizing quantum computing

video_1.title: Quantum Intelligence for Chemistry Simulations
video_1.description: MolKet harnesses the power of quantum intelligence to revolutionize simulations in chemistry and physics. Our AI agents, trained on intricate Hamiltonian derivations, predict the behavior of complex systems, significantly accelerating research and discovery.

video_2.title: Accelerating Chemical Design with AI Agents
video_2.description: Alain Chancé and Dr. Taha Selim propose leveraging AI agents to accelerate chemical design and quantum dynamical simulations. These AI agents can be trained on the inputs and outputs of quantum chemistry and dynamics algorithms, effectively replacing computationally expensive components.

Our_Development_Model.title: Our Development Model
Our_Development_Model.subtitle: We can help you by providing what you need from built-in libraries that help you in your execution.
